name: The Moon Cheese
description:
"Dad and mom say the moon is not cheese, but I know it is something adults say to keep all the cheese for themselves. So I'll go to the moon myself and bring my own cheese! I only need to build my own rocket." 
- Lea, 4 years old

The Moon Cheese is a point and click game inspired by Syberia games, here a girl named Lea, want's to eat a lot of cheese, but her parents don't want that. She belives that all adults wants the cheese for themselves and she is trying to find a big cheese: The moon!

Known issues:
    1.- Visual, GUI, at the end of the final quest, the stiker engine is not visible.

Future features:
    1.- Turorial to guide the user
    2.- Add more quests
    3.- Retry or reset any quest
    4.- Add menu pause
